Articles.Content:
Hello there!

Yet again i wanted to show of a video i made a couple of days ago, and i would like to hear your opinion about it! This is also one of my first times trying out After Effects with smoke effects and so on

Have a nice day
I liked it very much. It's quite professionally done.

Fantastic. Seriously. The music and camera shots and subject all add up to one very pleasant viewing experience. Please do more, and longer, and how about a whole mission with your special flair for presentation. Outstanding.
you know exactly what you want to achieve. 5/5

Fantastic. Seriously. The music and camera shots and subject all add up to one very pleasant viewing experience. Please do more, and longer, and how about a whole mission with your special flair for presentation. Outstanding.

Thanks, yes, i should make a longer movie SOMETIME. But it's really really time consuming so we'll see.

Thanks, yes, i should make a longer movie SOMETIME. But it's really really time consuming so we'll see.

Yes it is. Took me the entire morning to make a 6 minute video of the Gigant 4 Mission to Duna launch.
